Package com.abhyudayasharma.texteditor.editor

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Editor
    A text editor that uses StyledDocument for setting attributes to each character.
    FontSelector
    A Panel from which a user can select a font from all the Fonts installed in his/her computer.
    StylizedClipboard
    A clipboard used by the StylizedTextPane.
    StylizedClipboard.StylizedCharacter
    A container for the attributes of a styled character
    StylizedTextPane
    A JTextPane that uses a StyledDocument to store formatted text.
